resources.string: Veil of Maya is an American deathcore band, formed in Chicago, Illinois. The group is currently signed to Sumerian Records.
This page is the album select page.
This page is the song select page for the Matriach album.
This page is the song select page for the id album.
This page is the song select page for the Eclipse album.
This page is the song select page for the album The Colapse of tthe Common Man.
